pages.text: $(li)The Seed Pouch is a new item that can store up to 10 stacks of any seed in it.
$(li)To add seeds, grab the seed you want to add in your inventory, and right click it onto the pouch.
$(li)Now, you can right click the pouch to take a stack of seeds out.
$(li)Right clicking the pouch onto farmable soil will plant the seed. You can plan a 3x3 area shift right clicking.
$(li)Holding the seed pouch in either hand will have picked up seeds of that type go directly in the bag.$(br)$(li)If the Usage Ticker feature is enabled, it'll show how many seeds you have left.
